headline: Knight Therapeutics Announces Launch of Minjuvi® (tafasitamab) in Mexico
summary: MONTREAL, March 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Knight Therapeutics Inc., (TSX: GUD) ("Knight"), a pan-American (ex-US) specialty pharmaceutical company, announced today the launch of Minjuvi® (tafasitamab) by its Mexican affiliate, Grupo Biotoscana de Especialidad S.A. de C.V. Minjuvi® in combination with lenalidomide, followed by Minjuvi® monotherapy, is indicated for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), who are not eligible for autolo
